head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BAEHR, I.E. THEODORE (AKA ROBERT ALLEN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BAEHR, I.E. THEODORE (AKA ROBERT ALLEN)

block.p: BAEHR - I.E. Theodore (aka Robert Allen). On Oct. 9th, 1998, age 92. Beloved husband of the late Evelyn Pierce, dearly loved father of Katherine (Charles) Meyer, and Theodore (Liliana) Baehr. Beloved grandfather of seven and great grandfather of six. Funeral service will held Friday, Oct. 16, 1998 at 2 P.M. at The First Presbyterian Church, Oyster Bay. In lieu of flowers, please send contributions to The Christian Film and TV Commission, 2510-6 Los Pasos Road, Camarillo, CA. 93010.
